name: ParkTo
description:
ParkTo is a simple puzzle game that stops the car at its destination.

You don't drive a car yourself. The car just moves forward'.
Use the given triggers to move the car to its destination: LEFT, RIGHT, STOP, BACKWARD, etc.
Triggers can be placed on the path of the car or used on the car itself.

FEATURES

  • 48 handcrafted levels.
  • Various trigger interactions reflecting car movements.
  • Comfortable colors and minimal graphics.
  • You can play without a driving license!
